product_name: GoPro The Frame Housing Mount - HERO3
long_description: GoPro The Frame housing mount is the smallest and lightest way to mount your HERO3 camera (sold separately). Its sleek design makes it perfect for compact and low-profile mounting. Lens cap helps protect the camera lens. The Frame is engineered to preserve optimal sound, even at speed. Compatible with LCD Touch BacPac(TM) and second-generation Battery BacPac(TM), sold separately. Comes with a standard frame, BacPac frame, flat adhesive mount, curved adhesive mount and assorted mounting hardware. Note: The Frame is not waterproof and is not optimized for use in extreme conditions where dirt and sharp objects can damage the camera lens.
short_description: GoPro The Frame housing mount is the smallest and lightest way to mount your HERO3 camera (sold separately). Its sleek design makes it perfect for compact and low-profile mounting.
